pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression with Compositional Covariates // Regression methodologies with compositional covariates, including (1) sparse log-contrast regression with compositional covariates proposed by Lin et al. (2014) doi:10.1093/biomet/asu031, and (2) sparse log-contrast regression with functional compositional predictors proposed by Sun et al. (2020) arXiv:1808.02403.
